# Support

We are here to help! If you encounter any issues or need assistance, please follow the instructions below.

## A different way to get support

### 1. Check the Documentation

Before asking for help, please review the project's `README.md` and documentation. Many common questions are already answered there.

### 2. Opening an Issue

If you cannot find a solution:

1. Go to the [Issues](https://github.com/ahmed-abd-alalim/nizam/issues) page.
2. Click **New Issue**.
3. Provide a clear and descriptive title.
4. Include the following details in the description:
   - **Expected behavior:** What you expected to happen
   - **Actual behavior:** What actually happened
   - **Steps to reproduce:** Step-by-step instructions to reproduce the issue
   - **Environment:** OS, browser, Node version, or any relevant software
   - **Screenshots or logs** (if applicable)

### 3. Contact via Email

If your question is private or sensitive, you can reach the support team at: `ahmedabdalalim.3a@gmail.com`

### 4. Contact me directly

- My LinkedIn: [linkedin.com](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ahmed-abd-alalim-286768299/)
- My WebSite: [ahmedabdalalim.pages.dev](https://ahmedabdalalim.pages.dev/)

## Response Time

We aim to respond to issues within **48 hours**. Please be patient if our response is delayed.

## Contribution Support

If your question is about contributing code:

- Read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) file
- Follow the guidelines for bug reports, feature requests, or pull requests
